features.name: Authentication System

features.description: Administrative interface for managing users, appointments, and system monitoring

features.description: Product catalog, shopping cart, and order management system

features.name: User Dashboard
features.description: User profile management and personal dashboard with pet overview

features.name: Subscription System
features.description: Subscription plans management and user subscription handling

features.name: Help Center
features.description: Customer support system with help articles and ticket management

features.name: Check-in System
features.description: Pet check-in functionality for appointments and services

features.name: Growth Journey
features.description: Pet growth tracking and milestone recording system

features.name: Care Extras
features.description: Additional care services and extras management

features.name: Coupon System
features.description: Discount coupons and promotional codes management

features.name: Address Management
features.description: CEP lookup and address validation service

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Reusable UI components including header, loading spinner, and modals

features.name: Error Handling

features.name: Testing Suite
